job.title: Software Design Engineer
job.description: Hunter Engineering Company, a global leader in the development and manufacturing of computer-based automotive service equipment.<br><br>We are currently seeking a R&amp;D Engineer- Software Design for our R&amp;D operations.<br><br>Founded in 1946, Hunter has a history of product ingenuity and growth and has been a worldwide market leader for decades. Our computer-based products set the quality and technological standard in the industry. Hunter Engineering Company offers state-of-the-art automotive service equipment such as wheel alignment systems, wheel balancers, tire changers, lift racks, and brake testers.<br><br><strong><u>Job Summary<br><br></u></strong>We are looking for a Software Design Engineer to design and develop machine vision based products with emphasis on software development.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li> Perform new product research and conceptual design as member of our design team </li><li> Develop, implement, and test vision based software algorithms </li><li> Support development of application level software </li><li> Support further development of existing products as needed </li><li> Support development of factory test fixtures as required <br></li></ul><strong><u>Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> Bachelor’s of Science degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science </li><li> Experience with Microsoft Visual Studio is preferred </li><li> Knowledgeable in matrix algebra, 3D perspective geometry, and optimization algorithms </li><li> Experience developing application level software including screen design and user interface design </li><li> Experience with working in a multiple developer team environment with configuration management and defect tracking tools is preferred </li><li> Experience in developing code for embedded systems is also desired </li><li> Experience developing software in C, C++, using a Windows-based development environment is required <br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Experience<br></u></strong><ul><li> C# </li><li> Azure </li><li> Electron &amp; Angular </li><li> .NET Core, React, &amp; TypeScript </li><li> JSON </li><li> RESTful APIs </li><li> Version Control: Team Foundation Server and/or Git</li></ul>
